page.title: 16Our surroundings.
page.content: The countryside around our area is quite beautiful.There are the downlands to the north where the chalklands give rise to good farmland,and much closer to the town we have the River Test which runs through a very picturesque valley. There is always plenty of wildlife to see on the many waljs that you could make in this area.The Test is of course noted for it's trout,but along the course of the river you can see kingfishers and swans which reguarly can be seen flying along the valley.Many of Britain's small mammals can be seen in the area. The flora of the area is typically chalkland.If take a walk through the area you will find very few areas which are eyesores spoilt by pollution.
